title: Serendipitous white bread
ingredients: ['225ml (8 oz) tepid water', '1 tablespoon granulated sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon sunflower oil or extra virgin olive oil', '400g (14 oz) strong bread flour', '1 tablespoon semi skimmed milk powder', '1 sachet dried fast-acting yeast']
